Dialogue.Page: Heyo, hatchling! Nice find you've got there. I assume you're back down here to show it off?
Me? I was using the old scout launcher and saw smoke in one of the photos, so I thought I’d come over here myself and take a look.

DialogueOption.Text: Is that a Dark Bramble seed?

Dialogue.Page: Blasted seed did a lot of damage when it crashed. I liked this crater.
Oh, hatchling. Nice thing you've got there. Sorry, I'm a bit distracted at the moment. Need something from me?

DialogueOption.Text: I threw a Little Scout into the seed.
My signalscope is picking up a harmonica inside the seed.
You’re sure this seed isn’t from Timber Hearth?

Dialogue.Page: Goodness. First this seed, now the sun's looking all wonky… what's going on?
Oh, hatchling. I didn't see you there. Sorry, I'm a bit distracted at the moment.
I was using the old scout launcher and saw smoke in one of the photos, so I thought I’d come over here myself and take a look.

DialogueOption.Text: Is that a Dark Bramble seed?

Dialogue.Page: Goodness. First this seed, now the sun's looking all wonky… what's going on?
Oh, hatchling. I didn't see you there. Sorry, I'm a bit distracted at the moment. Need something from me?

DialogueOption.Text: I threw a Little Scout into the seed.
My signalscope is picking up a harmonica inside the seed.
You’re sure this seed isn’t from Timber Hearth?

Dialogue.Page: Stars above! What's happening?! Is that coming from the seed?
